assetProfile.address2: Veera Desai Industrial Road off New Link Road Andheri (West)
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Patel Engineering Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides integrated infrastructure and construction services in India and internationally. The company undertakes hydro-power projects, including dams, tunnels, power-houses, and barrages; irrigation and water supply projects comprising dams, weirs, and pump houses; urban infrastructure projects and others, which include sewerage, micro tunneling and horizontal directional drilling, and pipelines; and transportation projects, such as roads, bridges, flyovers, and tunnels for railways. It also undertakes real estate projects, such as buildings, townships, malls, and structures. Patel Engineering Limited was founded in 1949 and is based in Mumbai, India.
